description: Cards grouped by a category field with per-group headers and expandable detail. Each card shows title, badge, and expandable description. Excellent for typed/categorized analytical items like tactics, strategies, or stakeholder positions.
ideal_for: any array of objects with a grouping dimension
instantiation_hints: 1. Set 'items_path' to the JSON path of the array in engine output. 2. Set 'group_by' to the field name used for categorization. 3. Set 'columns' to 1 for detailed cards, 2 for compact cards, 3 for overview. 4. Configure field mappings: title_field, badge_field, description_field. 5. Add 'group_style_map' if you want per-group color coding.
